text: IK's new iRig KEYS PRO is the most compact full-size MIDI keyboard controller on the market.
In fact, it's 30 percent smaller than any other
full-size MIDI keyboard controller that can be played with two hands.
This shows the size of iRig KEYS PRO
compared to that of other leading controllers with full size keys.
Despite its compact footprint, we didn't cut corners in the design.
iRig KEYS PRO has 37 full-size velocity-sensitive keys
and is loaded with the features you need for live performance,
jamming, and music production.
You get pitch and mod wheels and an input for sustain or expression pedal.
A built-in programmable volume data knob makes it easy to store and send
MIDI control change and program change data.
Four backlit soft touch buttons let you adjust
octave up/down, transpose the keyboard,
and even save four custom performance set-ups.
You can use iRig KEYS PRO anywhere
because it's fully bus-powered. It gets its power from the
iPhone, iPod touch, iPad, or Mac or PC computer that it's connected to.
iRig KEYS PRO comes with three different connection cables
including lightning, 30-pin, and USB
so it's good to go with any iOS device or computer
right out of the box - plus you get SampleTank FREE
and iGrand Piano FREE for iOS and SampleTank L for Mac and PC to kick-start your creativity.
iRig KEYS is Core MIDI and USB Class Compliant
which means it's plug-and-play all the way - no drivers to download,
no complicated configuring - just plug it in and start playing.
the ultra-compact iRig KEYS PRO
with full-size keys from IK Multimedia
